name: Light Togetic
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: It becomes depressed if it is not near kind-hearted people. Is is able to float in the air without moving its wings.

abilities.name: Gift
abilities.effect: When you play Light Togetic from your hand, your opponent may search his or her deck for a Pokémon Tool card, show that card to you, and put it into his or her hand. Either way, you may do the same, and then each player who searched shuffles his or her deck.

attacks.name: Sweet Kiss
attacks.effect: Your opponent may draw a card.
